title: How the SPY Happy Lens™ Works
description:
Happy is here!

The SPY Happy Lens™ lets in the good rays that promote balance in the body, increase alertness, and have an uplifting effect on mood, while simultaneously blocking the bad rays. As an added bonus, it's also a color contrast-enhancing lens available polarized and non-polarized, giving you the best visual experience possible. 

The Happy Lens™ is now available and only from your friends at SPY. Learn more about the Happy Lens™ at http://www.spyoptic.com/happy and find your local retailer at http://www.spyoptic.com/dealers
